net.sf.mmm.util.reflect.api

Interface ReflectionUtilLimited

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GenericTypeFactory
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ReflectionUtil
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReflectionUtilImpl, ReflectionUtilLimitedImpl

    public interface ReflectionUtilLimited
extends GenericTypeFactory
    This is a limited subset of ReflectionUtil that is GWT compatible.
    Since:
    3.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Detail

      • getNonPrimitiveType

        <T> Class<T> getNonPrimitiveType(Class<T> type)
        This method gets the according non-primitive type for the class given by type.
        E.g. getNonPrimitiveType(int.class) will return Integer.class.
        Type Parameters:
        T - is the generic type of the given type Class.
        Parameters:
        type - is the (potentially) primitive type.
        Returns:
        the according object-type for the given type. This will be the given type itself if it is NOT primitive.
        Since:
        1.0.2
        See Also:
        Class.isPrimitive()
